TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to add link between Cause and Counter Measure Category.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on linking screen tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on linking screen tab .
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on linking screen tab .

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select crash type.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select crash type.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select crash type.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is click on add button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on add button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on add button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select possible cause.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select possible cause.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select possible cause.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select counter measure.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select counter measure.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select counter measure.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on save button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify toast message.
